snippet: At a meeting in Nigeria, leaders from the 15-nation Economic Community of West African States said they would send 3,300 soldiers to wrest control of northern Mali from Islamist extremists.
abstract: Leaders from 15-nation Economic Community of West African States, at emergency summit meeting in Nigeria, say they will send 3,300 soldiers to wrest control of northern Mali from Islamist extremists.
lead_paragraph: At a meeting in Nigeria, leaders from the 15-nation Economic Community of West African States said they would send 3,300 soldiers to wrest control of northern Mali from Islamist extremists.

headline.seo: West African Leaders Agree to Send Troops to Mali
headline.main: African Leaders Agree to Send Troops to Mali
headline.print_headline: African Leaders Agree to Send Troops to Mali

keywords.value: Economic Community of West African States (Ecowas)
